class="RankList__RankLink-sc-2xewen-3 jHTFDg has-badge"><div class="RankList__Rank-sc-2xewen-2 fxzjOx ranked has-badge"><strong>#1</strong></div><span class="in">in </span><strong>Regional Universities Midwest</strong></a></li></ul><div class="flex"><div class="Box-w0dun1-0 Rating__Container-sc-1naeqqj-0 fwvgzM eRZspG Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr" spacing="0" aria-label="4.6 out of 5"><svg stroke="#1263D3" fill="#1263D3" class="Rating__IconSvg-sc-1naeqqj-1 JKGGh"><use xlink:href="#star"></use></svg><svg stroke="#1263D3" fill="#1263D3" class="Rating__IconSvg-sc-1naeqqj-1 JKGGh"><use xlink:href="#star"></use><defs><linearGradient id="848ecf37-1f52-42ab-8c30-1c9ef4d5f507" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="0%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff"></stop></linearGradient></defs></svg><a href="/best-colleges/butler-university-1788/reviews" class="Anchor-byh49a-0 hkqDVB ml2">5 reviews</a></div><span size="4" tabindex="0" class="Span-sc-19wk4id-0 lCyXL" style="line-height: 0; cursor: pointer;"><svg role="img" fill="#6F7480" width="1.5rem" height="1.5rem" class="Icon-sc-9wq8ul-0 Tooltip__TooltipIcon-gfkrkc-0 hiHdJZ mmMeU"><use xlink:href="#help" filter="0"></use></svg></span></div></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Butler University is located just a few miles from downtown Indianapolis. The nearby Broad Ripple Village neighborhood offers trendy restaurants, shopping and nightspots. Freshmen live in one of two residence halls, while upperclassmen can choose to live in a residential college or university apartment. Greek life is prominent at Butler, involving more than a third of the student body. Other organizations include The Collegian student newspaper and the Butler Chorale. The Butler Bulldogs compete in the NCAA Division I and are well known for their successful men's basketball teams. The final game of the 1986 film "Hoosiers" was filmed in Butler's Hinkle Fieldhouse, which is a National Historic Landmark.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Butler University is located just a few miles from downtown Indianapolis. The nearby Broad Ripple Village neighborhood offers trendy restaurants, shopping and nightspots. Freshmen live in one of two residence halls, while upperclassmen can choose to live in a residential college or university apartment. Greek life is prominent at Butler, involving more than a third of the student body. Other organizations include The Collegian student newspaper and the Butler Chorale. The Butler Bulldogs compete in the NCAA Division I and are well known for their successful men's basketball teams. The final game of the 1986 film "Hoosiers" was filmed in Butler's Hinkle Fieldhouse, which is a National Historic Landmark.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ href="/best-colleges/truman-state-2495">Truman State University</a></h3><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 pyUjv">Kirksville, MO</p></div><div spacing="3" class="Box-w0dun1-0 doGngp"><ul class="RankList__RankLink-sc-2xewen-3 jHTFDg has-badge"><div class="RankList__Rank-sc-2xewen-2 fxzjOx ranked has-badge"><strong>#2</strong></div><span class="in">in </span><strong>Regional Universities Midwest<span>&nbsp;(tie)</span></strong></a></li></ul><div class="flex"><div class="Box-w0dun1-0 Rating__Container-sc-1naeqqj-0 fwvgzM eRZspG Rating-sc-1naeqqj-2 kiGUEr reviews</a></div><span size="4" tabindex="0" class="Span-sc-19wk4id-0 lCyXL" style="line-height: 0; cursor: pointer;"><svg role="img" fill="#6F7480" width="1.5rem" height="1.5rem" class="Icon-sc-9wq8ul-0 Tooltip__TooltipIcon-gfkrkc-0 hiHdJZ mmMeU"><use xlink:href="#help" filter="0"></use></svg></span></div></div><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__Container-sc-1hoyc1r-5 cEYJIw Hide-kg09cx-0 hWOBmI" id="ellipsis-container"><div size="3" spacing="0" class="MultilineEllipsis__HeightRestriction-sc-1hoyc1r-6 hpOjWM"><div class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Located in the rural town of Kirksville, Mo., Truman State University is about a three hour drive southeast of Des Moines and three hours northwest of St. Louis. Undergraduate Truman students can choose from nearly 50 areas of study, and graduate students can choose from nine, including accounting through its business school. Truman helps students secure their post-college plans through its Career Center, which helps with resumes and interviews, and the Truman in Washington Program, which connects students with internships and alumni in D.C. Each fall, students kick off the academic year by enjoying music and games at Trumanâs Dawg Fest celebration, and then they explore extracurricular opportunities at the Activities Fair. Truman students can get involved with Greek life, around 250 student organizations, or intramural sports. Truman also offers 18 varsity sports teams, called the Bulldogs, which compete in the NCAA Division II Great Lakes Valley Conference. One of Trumanâs most notable alumni is Jenna Fischer, who played Pam Beesly in the NBC comedy "The Office."</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Located in the rural town of Kirksville, Mo., Truman State University is about a three hour drive southeast of Des Moines and three hours northwest of St. Louis. Undergraduate Truman students can choose from nearly 50 areas of study, and graduate students can choose from nine, including accounting through its business school. Truman helps students secure their post-college plans through its Career Center, which helps with resumes and interviews, and the Truman in Washington Program, which connects students with internships and alumni in D.C. Each fall, students kick off the academic year by enjoying music and games at Trumanâs Dawg Fest celebration, and then they explore extracurricular opportunities at the Activities Fair. Truman students can get involved with Greek life, around 250 student organizations, or intramural sports. Truman also offers 18 varsity sports teams, called the Bulldogs, which compete in the NCAA Division II Great Lakes Valley Conference. One of Trumanâs most notable alumni is Jenna Fischer, who played Pam Beesly in the NBC comedy "The Office."</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Milwaukee School of Engineering, known as MSOE, is located in downtown Milwaukee next to both the historic East Town and the Theater District and just a few blocks from Lake Michigan. Student organizations at MSOE fall into one of seven categories: government, Greek, honors societies, professional, religious, service, and special interest. Intramural sports, including football, volleyball, broomball, and dodgeball, are popular activities among students. MSOEâs varsity athletic teams, the Raiders, compete in NCAA Division III sports. The Kern Center athletic facility houses an ice rink, basketball arena, indoor track, fitness center, and field house. Freshmen and sophomores are required to live on campus in one of the three coed residence halls. Annual campus traditions include Constitution and Citizenship Week, Raider Week for school spirit, and St. Patrickâs Week.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Milwaukee School of Engineering, known as MSOE, is located in downtown Milwaukee next to both the historic East Town and the Theater District and just a few blocks from Lake Michigan. Student organizations at MSOE fall into one of seven categories: government, Greek, honors societies, professional, religious, service, and special interest. Intramural sports, including football, volleyball, broomball, and dodgeball, are popular activities among students. MSOEâs varsity athletic teams, the Raiders, compete in NCAA Division III sports. The Kern Center athletic facility houses an ice rink, basketball arena, indoor track, fitness center, and field house. Freshmen and sophomores are required to live on campus in one of the three coed residence halls. Annual campus traditions include Constitution and Citizenship Week, Raider Week for school spirit, and St. Patrickâs Week.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ class="MultilineEllipsis__ContentSizedContainer-sc-1hoyc1r-7 cEohUC"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Dordt University is a Christian institution located in Sioux Center, Iowa, about an hour from Sioux City. Students can get involved with any of the approximately 40 organizations and clubs on campus, including a Monday Morning Coffee Club and Wrestling Club. Dordt also offers a variety of ministry opportunities, such as weekly chapel service and student-led small groups for prayer. The Putting Love Into Action organization is one of several groups on campus that organize service projects and trips. The Dordt Defenders field a number of varsity teams that compete in the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics. Nearly 90% of students live in on-campus residence halls or apartments.</p><div class="MultilineEllipsis__FullHeightReferenceWrapper-sc-1hoyc1r-4 bTPBIi"><p class="Paragraph-sc-1iyax29-0 lbGMQc">Dordt University is a Christian institution located in Sioux Center, Iowa, about an hour from Sioux City. Dordt also offers a variety of ministry opportunities, such as weekly chapel service and student-led small groups for prayer. The Putting Love Into Action organization is one of several groups on campus that organize service projects and trips. The Dordt Defenders field a number of varsity teams that compete in the National Association of Intercollegiate Athletics. Nearly 90% of students live in on-campus residence halls or apartments.</p></div></div></div><div><a class="Anchor-byh49a-0 deBdCQ MultilineEllipsis__ReadMore-sc-1hoyc1r-3 JzQgR
